title: Diamond Mangalsutra Pendant - A Timeless Elegance
materials: G Color). Features Hyderabadi polish for lasting shine.
features: Delicate floral-inspired design with meticulously set diamonds. The openwork lattice pattern creates a modern yet elegant aesthetic. Teardrop diamond accents add a touch of sophistication. The pendant is designed for comfortable wear and a secure fit.
colors: Yellow Gold and Sparkling White Diamonds.
occasions: as a modern take on the traditional Mangalsutra.
description: This diamond pendant offers a contemporary twist on the traditional Mangalsutra/Tali Bottu. The high-quality diamonds and craftsmanship ensure lasting beauty and value. Its elegant design allows for versatile styling, making it perfect for both daily wear and special occasions. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, ensuring it remains radiant for years to come.
